sentences.sContent: At first this amphibian deals with the cooler days by burying itself in the soil.
sentences.sCn: 起初，天气乍凉的时候，这种两栖动物将自己埋在土壤里。

sentences.sContent: Why does the speaker choose that amphibian as her representative of a public creature?
sentences.sCn: 诗人为何选择这个两栖动物作为公众人物的代表？

sentences.sContent: "Almost all of them were abandoned somewhere in the city, " said Wu Weichun, the director of the zoo's amphibian department, to the Shanghai Dailynewspaper.
sentences.sCn: “它们中几乎所有都是在城市里被遗弃的，”动物园两栖动物馆主任吴文春对《上海每日新闻报》说。

synos.tran: [脊椎]两栖动物；[车辆]水陆两用飞机；具有双重性格的人

words.tran: [生物] 两栖的，水陆两用的；具有双重性的

trans.tranOther: an animal such as a  frog  that can live both on land and in water
